update rf_user_data
nationality_id = (case when nationality_id is null then #{record.nationalityId,jdbcType=INTEGER} else nationality_id + #{record.nationalityId,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
province_id = (case when province_id is null then #{record.provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER} else province_id + #{record.provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
city_id = (case when city_id is null then #{record.cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER} else city_id + #{record.cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),

lottery_count = (case when lottery_count is null then #{record.lotteryCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} else lottery_count + #{record.lotteryCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),

update rf_user_data
nationality_id = (case when nationality_id is null then #{nationalityId,jdbcType=INTEGER} else nationality_id + #{nationalityId,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
province_id = (case when province_id is null then #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER} else province_id + #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
city_id = (case when city_id is null then #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER} else city_id + #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
reorder = (case when reorder is null then #{reorder,jdbcType=INTEGER} else reorder + #{reorder,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
lottery_count = (case when lottery_count is null then #{lotteryCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} else lottery_count + #{lotteryCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT distinct rud.* from rf_user_data rud left join rf_user ru on rud.user_id=ru.user_id where rud.device_token != '' and exists (select user_id from rf_user_pad rup left join rf_pad rp on rp.pad_id=rup.pad_id where ru.user_id=rup.user_id AND rp.bind_status='1'
and rp.pad_name like #{padName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
and rp.pad_code like #{padCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
and ru.pad_ip LIKE #{padIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
)
